title: Uncharted 2: Among Thieves
installation_guide: Download the PPU file using the Download button
Place the file in your RPCS3 folder: /dev_hdd0/cache/
Verify file integrity through RPCS3's File Manager
Launch the game and enjoy improved performance

title: The Last of Us
installation_guide: Download both PPU files using the Download buttons
Copy files to /dev_hdd0/cache/ directory in your RPCS3 installation
Set SPU Decoder to Recompiler (ASMJIT) in RPCS3 settings
Configure additional graphics settings for optimal performance

title: Heavy Rain
installation_guide: Download the PPU file to your computer
Transfer the file to RPCS3's cache folder (/dev_hdd0/cache/)
Make sure Write Color Buffers is enabled in RPCS3 settings
Start the game and verify PPU cache loading in log window

title: Red Dead Redemption
installation_guide: Download both required PPU files
Place them in RPCS3's /dev_hdd0/cache/ directory
Enable Accurate xfloat option in RPCS3 advanced CPU settings
Set Anisotropic Filter to 16x for best visuals

title: Grand Theft Auto V
installation_guide: Download all three PPU files required for this game
Place files in /dev_hdd0/cache/ folder within your RPCS3 installation
Configure RPCS3 with recommended GTA V settings (Resolution Scale: 150%, SPU Threads: 2)
Verify all files are loaded before launching the game
Set Frame Limit to 30 FPS for best stability
